welcome_message: Welcome to the React i18n demo!

home.title: Welcome to RawSeed
home.subtitle: Purity from the Ground Up
home.description: At RawSeed, we believe that nature holds the key to true nourishment. Founded in the UK, our mission is to reconnect people with the honest power of natural oils—pure, unrefined, and rooted in tradition. We specialize in the production of cold-pressed sesame oil and black seed oil, proudly presented under our flagship brand: Golden Drop.

sesame_oil.title: Why Sesame Oil?
sesame_oil.subtitle: Ancient Wisdom, Modern Cooking
sesame_oil.description: At RawSeed, we believe in reconnecting with ingredients that have stood the test of time. Sesame oil is one of the oldest, most nourishing oils known to humankind—yet it remains underused in modern kitchens. Here's why we think it’s time for sesame oil to reclaim its place in your pantry.

description.p1: RawSeed began with a simple question: What if oil could be made the way it used to be—slow, clean, and full of life?
description.p2: Disheartened by the rise of over-processed, chemically refined oils, we set out to create an alternative. Drawing on generations of knowledge and inspired by traditional methods, we established RawSeed to produce oils that are not only healthy, but also meaningful.
description.p3: We saw a growing need for transparency in food and wellness products. So we took a different path: back to the roots.
description.p4: We come from families that value natural remedies and time-honoured foods. Inspired by this heritage, we studied traditional oil pressing techniques across cultures—from ancient Anatolian sesame presses to the rich herbal traditions of the Middle East. We travelled, studied, and built partnerships with trusted growers—starting with sesame seeds sourced from rich soils in Afghanistan and Nigella sativa seeds carefully harvested in regions with long-standing herbal traditions.
description.p5: What we found was powerful: nature doesn't need to be altered to be effective—it just needs to be respected.

what_we_do.title: What We Do
what_we_do.p1: We produce and supply 100% cold-pressed oils that are:
what_we_do.p2: At the heart of our process is a simple yet powerful method: cold pressing. We use high-quality, raw seeds and apply zero heat and no chemicals—preserving all the nutrients, antioxidants, health benefits and delicate flavours that nature intended.
what_we_do.p3: Our oils are bottled with care and presented with clarity. Each product tells a story—from soil to seed to the golden drop in your hands.

sesame.title: Golden Drop Sesame Oil
sesame.description: A smooth, golden oil rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids.

black_seed.title: Golden Drop Black Seed Oil
black_seed.description: Highly prized for its healing properties and strong, earthy taste. Revered for centuries in traditional medicine, now available in its purest form.

flaxseed.title: Golden Drop Flaxseed Oil
flaxseed.description: A rich source of plant-based omega-3 fatty acids, perfect for supporting heart and brain health.

why_raw_seed.title: Why RawSeed?
why_raw_seed.item2: How it’s made matters even more.
why_raw_seed.p2: We work directly with farmers, building long-term relationships based on trust, fair pricing, and mutual respect for the land. Sustainability is a core value: we support traditional agriculture and strive to leave a light footprint in every step we take. We apply rigorous quality standards at every stage. Our packaging is minimal and recyclable. Our message is simple: let nature speak for itself.
why_raw_seed.p3: Whether you're using our oils for cooking or daily wellness, RawSeed is here to offer you a cleaner, more honest choice—crafted with care and rooted in authenticity.

value.p1: No shortcuts. No additives. Only nature.
value.p2: Honouring the wisdom of those before us.
value.p4: Supporting health through quality and transparency.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.p1: We dream of a world where natural, honest food is accessible and valued.
vision.p2: We want to inspire others to:
vision.p3: Our future plans include expanding our line to include other cold-pressed oils following the same principles of purity and sustainability.
vision.item3: Prioritize wellness from the inside out

journey.title: Join Our Journey
journey.p1: RawSeed is more than a product—it's a movement back to the essentials. We're proud to grow with our community of health seekers, conscious cooks, and lovers of natural living.
journey.p2: We invite you to explore the golden standard of our natural oils—with nothing added, and nothing taken away, learn our story, and taste the difference that true craftsmanship makes.

history.title: The History of Sesame Oil
history.p1: Sesame oil has been used for over 4,000 years. Civilizations across Asia, the Middle East, and Africa valued sesame oil not only for cooking, but also for medicine, skincare, and spiritual rituals.
history.p2: In Ayurveda and Traditional Chinese Medicine, sesame oil has long been revered for its healing, detoxifying, and balancing properties. It was known as the "queen of oils" for a reason.
history.p3: Today, we’re proud to continue this tradition through Golden Drop — our premium, cold-pressed sesame oil.

p1.title: Bold Flavour, Natural Goodness
p1.description: Sesame oil has a warm, nutty flavour that adds depth and aroma to any dish. Use it in cooking, salad dressings, dips, marinades, stir-fries, or simply drizzle over roasted vegetables or warm bread.

p2.title: Heart-Healthy Fats
p2.description: Cold-pressed sesame oil is rich in monounsaturated and polyunsaturated fats—the kind that help lower bad cholesterol and support overall cardiovascular health.

p3.title: Naturally Rich in Antioxidants
p3.description: Packed with compounds like sesamol, sesamin, and vitamin E, sesame oil helps protect your body from oxidative stress while supporting skin and cellular health.

p4.title: High Smoke Point
p4.description: Whether you’re sautéing, roasting, or finishing a dish, sesame oil holds up beautifully in the kitchen thanks to its stable structure and high smoke point.

p5.title: Sustainable Minimal
p5.description: Sesame seeds are drought-resistant and grow with minimal inputs, making sesame oil a more sustainable choice compared to many mass-produced oils.

rediscovery.title: Rediscovering Sesame Oil
rediscovery.p1: We believe sesame oil is more than just an ingredient—it’s a story of heritage, health, and natural excellence.
rediscovery.p2: That’s why every bottle of Golden Drop by RawSeed is:
rediscovery.item1: Cold-pressed from premium, ethically sourced sesame seeds
rediscovery.item2: Free from chemicals, additives, or refining
rediscovery.item3: Bottled with care to preserve aroma, taste, and nutrients
rediscovery.p3: Bring the richness of tradition and the purity of nature to your kitchen with Golden Drop Sesame Oil — the oil your cooking deserves.

callout.title: Ready to Make the Switch?
callout.p1: Explore our product range or learn more about how sesame oil can enhance your recipes, your health, and your lifestyle.

hero.title: Why Black Seed Oil?
hero.subtitle: A Drop of Tradition. A Lifetime of Benefits.
hero.description: For centuries, black seed oil has been revered as a healing remedy across cultures and continents. Known as the “Oil of the Pharaohs” and mentioned in ancient medical texts, it is now gaining global recognition for its powerful natural benefits. At RawSeed, we’re proud to produce premium, cold-pressed black seed oil that honours this timeless legacy.

story.title: The Legacy of Black Seed
story.p1: Black seed oil is pressed from the seeds of Nigella sativa, a flowering plant native to South and Southwest Asia. These tiny black seeds—also known as black cumin, kalonji, or habbat al-barakah (the blessed seed)—have been used for over 2,000 years in traditional healing systems like Unani, Ayurveda, and Islamic medicine.
story.p2: It was found in the tomb of King Tutankhamun, praised by Hippocrates, and famously referenced in hadith as a remedy for “every disease except death”.
story.p3: At RawSeed, we extract this oil using traditional cold-pressing methods, without heat or chemicals, to preserve its full potency and purity.

blackseed_oil.why_special: What Makes Black Seed Oil Special?

immunity_booster.title: Natural Immunity Booster
immunity_booster.description: Black seed oil is rich in thymoquinone, a compound known for its anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and immune-supporting properties.

healthy_skin_and_hair.title: Skin, Hair Beauty
healthy_skin_and_hair.p1: Used topically, black seed oil can:
healthy_skin_and_hair.description: Used topically, black seed oil can:
healthy_skin_and_hair.item2: Support scalp health and promote hair growth
healthy_skin_and_hair.item3: Help reduce acne and inflammation. It’s a favourite in natural skincare and beauty routines

peaceful_mind_body.title: Mind & Body Balance
peaceful_mind_body.description: Black seed oil supports mental clarity, eases occasional stress, and is often used to promote respiratory health, joint comfort, and digestive wellness.

natural_wellness.title: 100% Natural Wellness
natural_wellness.description: Free from synthetic additives, cold-pressed black seed oil is a powerful and gentle way to incorporate ancient wellness into your modern lifestyle.

journey.title: Bring the Blessing Home
journey.p1: Black seed oil is more than a supplement—it’s a daily ritual, a gift from nature, and a bridge between ancient wisdom and modern health.
journey.p2: Try Golden Drop Black Seed Oil and experience the benefits of a remedy that has been trusted for generations.

hero.title: Pure Cold-Pressed Flaxseed Oil
hero.subtitle: Rich in Omega-3s for Heart Health, Radiant Skin, and Overall Vitality
hero.description: Golden Drop premium cold-pressed flaxseed oil is extracted without heat or chemicals, preserving the highest levels of alpha-linolenic acid (ALA) – nature's most potent plant-based omega-3. This golden treasure delivers exceptional nutritional benefits, from supporting cardiovascular wellness to promoting glowing skin and reducing inflammation. Elevate your daily routine with this pure, unrefined superfood oil for a healthier, more vibrant you.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.p1: We dream of a world where natural, honest food is once again cherished and within everyone’s reach—food made with intention, from carefully chosen ingredients and time-honoured traditional methods that preserve authenticity, flavour, and nourishment. Through our pure, sustainably produced cold-pressed oils and the expanding range that will follow the same uncompromising principles, we aim to honour the wisdom of the past while inspiring people today to rediscover the joy and value of real food.

hero.title: Share with us your thoughts
hero.subtitle: Let's build a healthier future together
hero.description: Whether you have questions about our products, want to learn more about our sourcing practices, or are interested in partnering with us, we're here to help. Reach out to the RawSeed team and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
